title: Conflict Of Interest

embed.description: LCK Summer Split Playoffs 2017 #LCK kt Rolster vs. SK telecom T1 Watch all matches of the split here from all of our leagues: NA LCS, EU LCS, LCK Champions Korea, LPL. FULL VOD PLAYLIST - https://www.youtube.com/user/LoLChampSeries/playlists?view=50&shelf_id=72&sort=dd You can always learn more and view the full match schedule at http://www.lolesports.com.

body:
Did anybody else see Faker totally wreck Samsung Galaxy with Lucian and Fizz yesterday. If you didn't see it and want to see some awesome Lucian play head to ---> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AE1QGIObfvo&t=12391s


 It was good to see SKT T1  hit form just at the right time. Will they do the same to KT Rolster tomorrow, I am looking forward to this one. 

It does clash with the OCS final ---> Outlaws vs Abyss Acadamy
If you are more into local games and want to see the teams looking for promotion into the OPL. 
You can watch this one here ---> https://www.twitch.tv/throwdowntv

I do know the quality of game is different but I'm still undecided which one to watch first.

Besides before I can watch either I have to run the 1v1 tournament --->https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters

Oh well at least its keeping me occupied.

ps Obviously going for STK against KT Rolster. Would like to see Outlaws beat Abyss Academy, and as for the 1v1 anyone but Teemo, come on guys/girls surely there are better champions to play than that.
